product_name: NiteRider Lumina Micro 250 Front Bike Light - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Packing a 250-lumen punch to brighten the path ahead during commutes and low-light rides, the Lumina Micro 250 Front Bike Light keeps things simple with its compact design and USB charging port.
short_description: Packing a 250-lumen punch to brighten the path ahead during commutes and low-light rides, the Lumina Micro 250 Front Bike Light keeps things simple with its compact design and USB charging port.
